Package de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.view

Represents the view of the MVC pattern and interacts with the user through a UI.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Help Gives the path to the help file.
 

Class Summary
DataGeneratorActions Here is where the actions caused by the UI main frame are handled.
DataGeneratorView DataGeneratorView class is the main view.
DistributionPanel This class gathers not only the probability distribution available to the system but also the parameters of those in a separate panel.
DistributionParameterPanel This is an abstract class for all probability distributions to put their parameters in.
NormalDistributionPanel This is an representation of parameters of the Normal probability distribution.
UniformDistributionPanel This class represents the parameters of an Uniform probability distribution.
ViewFactory This class handles the object creation of the view layer.
 

Package de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.view Description

Represents the view of the MVC pattern and interacts with the user through a UI. The view only has controll over its own layer and doesn't have any logic implemented conserning subjects of othe layers like the controller layer or the model layer. But this doesn't mean the view layer doesn't do anything on its own. It is, of course, responsible for the interaction with the user. Notice, this package also has a factory. Factories here are used to encapsulate the object creation from the actual use of that object. Factories are used when other layers use that object too. The package it resides is responsible for the creation and then passes it on.
